Reviews.Title: “What is this?”
Reviews.Author: Jacksmack
Reviews.Content: It's an airport stopover hotel and not meant to be mistaken for anything else. Convenient to Barajas airport in Madrid. Rooms are small, bathroom is small but adequate and little in the way of conveniences. Designed for overnight. My wake up call was 25 minutes late. Not an automatic system. Don't expect to read in bed. The matress slips away if lean against headboard. That said, the place looks new, is very clean and the staff very helpful and friendly. Especially Adrinna. Breakfast must be reserved day before. I would stay here again for an early flight.

Reviews.Title: “Apparently well but with a yellow substance in the bathtub”
Reviews.Author: ChipoChipolini
Reviews.Content: We ended up in this hotel because it have good reviews and the parking was cheaper when compared to other hotels. The parking is tiny, but we were aware of that (you have to reserve a space PREVIOUSLY). When we arrived the hotel looked ok and the rooms, although old, were APPARENTLY clean (with a weird smell). Mini bar was locked. But we were terrified when we took a shower and the bathtub seemed to be clogged and a very weird yellow substance like drool began to emanate from the bathtub. Avoid this place.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty much good”
Reviews.Author: wh0s0ever
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very clean, really well done. Receptionist very welcoming. Thank you guys . Keep going.

Reviews.Title: “Good location for airport/Feria, not too far from town”
Reviews.Author: ComeAndGoVietnam
Reviews.Content: Attending FITUR at the Feria de Madrid, near the airport, so booked this place as I don't want to travel too far to the show every day. The hotel is located in Barajas which, frankly, is a pretty rough part of Madrid. However, the hotel is only 10 minutes' walk from Barajas metro (not easy to find, but if you stop someone en route they will be able to direct you!), and is also 5 mins' walk from the bus 101 stop which also goes to the airport. Rooms are big with bathroom (bath/shower), TV, minibar and ADSL internet. Staff are very helpful and friendly. Buffet breakfast is worth the cost, continental isn't. Barajas itself is a pretty shabby place but there are some SUPERB restaurants near the hotel notably El Txoko de Anders (upmarket tapas/wine), La Caprichosa (good value Spanish food), and El Principal (rough & ready workers' bar with great set menus). The centre of the city is around 30-40 minutes away by metro, for only 1 euro (has to be the best value metro system in Europe). In short, if you're in Madrid purely for tourism you're better off in the centre of town, but if you need to be near the airport or the exhibition centre, this place is a real gem.

Reviews.Title: “Nice small hotel close to the Barajas Airport”
Reviews.Author: MalvolioBlanco
Reviews.Content: Obviously, I chose this hotel because of the location due to my late arrival and early departure from Barajas Airport. However, I must say that I can only recommend this hotel to anyone, even for a longer stay in the city. Hotel is ideally located 5 mins walk from Barajas tube station and offers a nice, family-like atmosphere, good service from the staff, delicious breakfast...all for a very reasonable price. Definately a great place for your stay for a trip to Madrid or Spain.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel minutes from the airport”
Reviews.Author: alison-keighley
Reviews.Content: very clean, friendly staff, about 5 minites from airport by car

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel near Airport”
Reviews.Author: Jo2710
Reviews.Content: Very nice and spacious room with classy furniture. The room and bathroom were clean. English speaking staff at frontdesk was very friendly. I stayed one night because of interrupted flight. It takes 10 min to get to the airport with the bus. The busstop is in walking distance from the hotel (5 min): go left to main place and take bus 101 to airport. Not recommended to take Taxi, Hotel -> Airport costs 19€ !! Several bars & restaurants near the Hotel. Hotel is located in housing area. Breakfast was elementary, but ok including coffee, toast, juice and muffins. I would stay there again!
